1.1

  • LHCStatus-1.1-Darwin-x86_64-gcc_421.zip
  • LHCStatus-release.apk
  • LHCStatus.app.zip

Android Market

LHCStatus is available on GooglePlay for devices with at least Android-2.1. Note that the LHCStatus-release.apk is also available from the download area.

Cocoa (Mac desktop)

On a Mac, download and unzip the LHCStatus.app.zip, then click on the LHCStatus icon (or do : open LHCStatus.app, from a terminal).

Apple AppStore

LHCStatus is not available on the AppStore. Apple rejected the app (in particular they found that the LHC status panel image is of poor quality).
